title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-3.5 - Suspension or renewal of certificate of approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-3.5 - Suspension or renewal of certificate of approval

State Regulations

Failure to meet at least the quarterly payment requirement shall result in suspension or nonrenewal of the certificate of approval. A laboratory whose approval has been suspended or not renewed pursuant to this section shall be assessed a fee calculated pursuant to section
55-3.7
(b) of this Subpart, if it seeks reapproval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
55-3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
